desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.animation

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.animation.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
    A comment to paint in a animation element, used in process and queue elements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Comment

        public Comment(java.lang.String text,
               int style,
               int size,
               java.awt.Color color,
               boolean sizeExt)
        A comment to paint in a animation element
        Parameters:
        text - Text of comment
        style - Style of comment, look at Comment.TEXT_Style_
        size - Size of comment, look at Comment.TEXT_Size_
        color - Color of comment
        sizeExt - Size of animation element will be extended by the size need for comment
